main event: A silvery object with no sound was observed at Bradley Beach, New Jersey, on 2-20-57.
interesting points: The sighting was reported on 2-22-57, The object appeared to be circular and had pulsating lights, The object was visible for 3-4 minutes, It was observed from a distance of 100 yards, There were 2 witnesses to the event.
sighted object: silvery circular object with pulsating lights
